titleStmt.title: An order of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, concerning His Maiesties forrests, parks, and chases: commanded to be published in all parishes where they are.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: The deer in Windsor and Waltham forests have been chased and killed, .. The law is to be enforced against offenders. .. -- Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
